casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Sam COHN et al., Defendants-Appellants. No. 256. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 20, 1938. Harry Loeb, Mostow, of New York City, for appellants. Thurman Arnold, Asst. Atty. Gen., John Harlan Amen, Sp. Asst, to Atty. Gen., and John A. Slciles, of Washington, D. C., and Moses M. Lewis, of New York City, Sp. Attys.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
